content: स्फोटः [स्फुट् करणे घञ्] {@--1@} Breaking forth, splitting open, bursting. {@--2@} Disclosure; as in नर्मस्फोट. {@--3@} A swelling, boil, tumour; अयमपरो गंडस्योपरि स्फोटः <ls>Mu. 5.</ls> {@--4@} The idea which bursts out or flashes on the mind when a sound is uttered, the impression produced on the mind at hearing a sound; बुधैर्वैयाकरणैः प्रधानभूतस्फोटरूपव्यंग्यव्यंजकस्य शब्दस्य ध्वनिरिति व्यवहारः कृतः <ls>K. P. 1</ls>, also see <ls>Sarva. S.</ls> (पाणिनीयदर्शन). {@--5@} The eternal sound recognised by the Mīmāṃsakas.
